BasicInfo.short: Vaultize is an enterprise platform for end-to-end file security with built-in rights management, secure file sharing & data protection.

Products.name: Vaultize
Products.description: Vaultize is an enterprise platform for end-to-end file security with built-in digital rights management (EDRM), data protection & DLP.
